title: Rod Shaul of Meridian Fire Department Dishes Up Chili
creator: Troy Maben/The Idaho Statesman
description: January 27, 1996: Rod Shaul, Meridian Fire Department, dishes up the “Firehouse Chili,” at a Chili Cookoff benefiting the Meridian Chamber of Commerce, in which MFD won the “People’s Choice” award. MFD had been recognized in past cookoffs for their great chili. Terry Hawkins, a volunteer firefighter, was the owner of the recipe. Photo by Troy Maben of the Idaho Statesman; see “Chefs concoct some hot stuff for annual Meridian Chili Cookoff” by Colleen LaMay and Photos by Troy Maben, Sunday January 28, 1996, page B-1 (local section)
subject: Firefighters; Fundraisers; Fund Raising

title: Christ Lutheran Church Donates to Meridian Fire Department Burnout Fund
creator: Geneva Trent/The Valley News-Times
description: Christ Luthern Church in Meridian presents a $500 check to the Meridian Fire Department for their Burnout Fund, which helps families who have lost everything from fire. Fireman Brian Zimmerman is on the far left, Next to Zimmerman in the front row from left to right are: Elizabeth Pacella, Alison Collins, Payton Hoerne, Ashlen Pacella and Rachel Pacella; 2nd row: Andy Cutler holding Nicole Collins, Tom Cutton, Andy Lambrecht, and Jennifer Bokenkamp. The three firemen in the back row are Mike Zumwalt, Ken Welborn and Drew Young.
